text: governments get way too much pleasure out of labeling people "terrorists". text:
People died yesterday. If politicians were not evacuated, some may have died yesterday.

<https://www.fbi.gov/investigate/terrorism>
> <https://www.fbi.gov/file-repository/fbi-dhs-domestic-terrorism-definitions-terminology-methodology.pdf/view|Domestic terrorism>: Violent, criminal acts committed by individuals and/or groups to further ideological goals stemming from domestic influences, such as those of a political, religious, social, racial, or environmental nature.
<https://www.fbi.gov/investigate/terrorism>

attachments.title: Domestic Terrorism: Definitions, Terminology, and Methodology | Federal Bureau of Investigation
attachments.text: As required by the National Defense Authorization Act, the FBI and Department of Homeland Security, in consultation with the Director of National Intelligence, have developed standard definitions of terminology related to domestic terrorism and uniform methodologies for tracking domestic terrorism incidents.
attachments.fallback: Federal Bureau of Investigation: Domestic Terrorism: Definitions, Terminology, and Methodology | Federal Bureau of Investigation

text: <https://www.britannica.com/topic/terrorism> even if that's the case, it's hard to argue that delaying confirmation of the election is a political objective

attachments.title: terrorism | Definition, History, & Facts
attachments.text: Terrorism, the calculated use of violence to create a general climate of fear in a population and thereby to bring about a particular political objective. Definitions of terrorism are complex and controversial; because of the inherent ferocity of terrorism, the term in its popular usage has developed an intense stigma.
attachments.fallback: Encyclopedia Britannica: terrorism | Definition, History, & Facts

text: I’m usually not a conspiracy theorist person, but Trump has brought that side to me. I’ve been afraid that he might for instance start a war with Iran just to make some pretext to stay in office longer, or that he’d be secretly controlled by Putin. This has caused me to sleep worse, for a LONG time, and this is a problem, for me. I have other reasons I don’t sleep that well, and I really would have benefited from not having Trump be around. And I live in Europe. I can’t even think how I’d feel if I lived in US.

This has caused me to sleep worse, for a LONG time, and this is a problem, for me. I have other reasons I don’t sleep that well, and I really would have benefited from not having Trump be around. And I live in Europe. I can’t even think how I’d feel if I lived in US.
